section_name: activities of households as employers; undifferentiated goods, and services,producing activities of households for own use
division_name: activities of households as employers of domestic personnel
group_name: activities of households as employers of domestic personnel
class_name: activities of households as employers of domestic personnel
includes: households employment of domestic personnel, e.g. cooks, cleaners, gardeners, chauffeurs, caretakers, babysitters, personal assistants etc. it allows the domestic personnel employed to state the activity of their employer in censuses or studies, even though the employer is an individual. the product produced by this activity is consumed by the employing household
excludes: provision of personal and household services (e.g. cleaning, ironing, cooking, gardening, home care services for dependents) by service providers (for,profit, not,for,profit, public organisations or self,employed), see according to type of service

section_name: activities of households as employers; undifferentiated goods, and services,producing activities of households for own use
division_name: undifferentiated goods, and services,producing activities of private households for own use
group_name: undifferentiated goods,producing activities of private households for own use
class_name: undifferentiated goods,producing activities of private households for own use
includes: the undifferentiated subsistence goods,producing activities of households, that is to say, the activities of households that are engaged in a variety of activities that produce goods for their own subsistence. these activities include hunting and gathering, farming, the production of shelter and clothing and other goods produced by the household for its own subsistence. if households are also engaged in the production of marketed goods, they are classified to the appropriate goods,producing industry of isic. if they are principally engaged in a specific goods,producing subsistence activity, they are classified to the appropriate goods,producing industry of isic

section_name: activities of households as employers; undifferentiated goods, and services,producing activities of households for own use
division_name: undifferentiated goods, and services,producing activities of private households for own use
group_name: undifferentiated service,producing activities of private households for own use

includes: the undifferentiated subsistence services,producing activities of households. these activities include cooking, teaching, caring for household members and other services produced by the household for its own subsistence. if households are also engaged in the production of multiple goods for subsistence purposes, they are classified to the undifferentiated goods,producing subsistence activities of households
